strapiPost.title: The Hogs are STREAKING
strapiPost.content:
Let's get down to business. First order of business? The Arkansas Razorbacks are streaking. Oh, and all-star senior guard Chelsea Dungee continues to build her legacy by earning a spot on the Wooden Award National Ballot. Here we go...

  • This past week, four Arkansas teams held onto mind-boggling winning streaks. Razorback Baseball now has 10 straight wins, Razorback Women's Tennis has 10 straight wins, Razorback Men's Basketball has 11 consecutive SEC wins (tying the 1993-94 team), and Razorback Softball has 15. W's. in. a. row.
  • Redshirt senior guard Chelsea Dungee was selected by the Wooden Award National Advisory Board to earn a spot on the Wooden Award National Ballot, which recognizes 15 student-athletes who are candidates for the Wooden Award All American Team and Wooden Award Trophy as the most outstanding college basketball player in the United States. -Pig Trail Nation
  • #OmaHogs: Razorback Baseball steamrolled Murray State 6-0 on Sunday and rode home with their 10th straight win. Here's what Coach Dave Van Horn had to say following the sweep.

To join in the fun, you can find a schedule of all sporting events HERE
